description: Defines a WishlistProvider class managing wishlist state, including loading data via WishlistService, and exposing methods to refresh, add, and remove wishlist items.

classes.name: WishlistProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based class that manages the wishlist state, exposing methods to update and retrieve wishlist data.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Loads the latest wishlist data from the service and updates the state.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a book to the wishlist by its ID and refreshes the wishlist.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes an entry from the wishlist by its ID and refreshes the wishlist.
